name: dropdown-menu-compat-react-18_3
description: Type compatibility test for dropdown-menu against React 18.3

scripts.clean-test: npm run clean-install-all && npm run test
scripts.clean-test:types: npm run clean-install-all && npm run test:types
scripts.pack-dropdown-menu: cd ../../.. && npm run build:dev && npm --silent pack
scripts.clean-install-all: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm run pack-dropdown-menu && npm install && npm run post-install-dropdown-menu
